name: Indie Runner Jones
description:
Indie Runner Jones and the Jungle of Infinite Running

Get the treasure, avoid the snakes. Don't step in the water or you'll sink to the bottom and the crocodiles will enjoy their meal. Indie Runner Jones is an 8bit style infinite runner game (scrolling platformer).

Made over the first weekend of March, 2014.

Press SPACE to jump; 'M' toggles the music if you're retro-hatin'.
